channel.title: ErasedPkz Source And Client (Fixed)
channel.description:
For Those New players who use this Source and Client "ErasedPkz (Fixed) The Client Wasn't working... I Fixed It for you so Here's The Link Comment Below Thought I'd Help You Out.. I've Also added Cache in for you.. in the files.. Enjoy.
[Download Link] http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?kuf774bw49f2gv9
Here's A Picture Of It Working Read The Information In the notepad I've Added Info In There To Help You. When I Say Go To The Client For New Players Go Into Client.Java With Notepad or Notepad ++
If You don't know what I fixed, I Fixed The Client... Error when it loads an error came up.. I Fixed it so it runs for you..
Find LocalHost And Change To Your Server I.p or Hamachi I.p
Here's The Picture.. Of after I edited it for it to work.. [img]http://i1240.photobucket.com/albums/gg495/Premium-Elite/ClientErasedPkz.jpg[/img]
Here's The Picture before when it didn't work [IMG]http://i1240.photobucket.com/albums/gg495/Premium-Elite/ErrorClient.jpg[/img]
Also Tell me If This Helps You..

item.title: ErasedPkz Source And Client (Fixed)
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

Premium-Elite:

I Love how I try doing something nice and your all going on at me like I’m doing something bad? CHEERS yeh.

Don’t expect to become famous for changing one line of code. Sorry, this is prob the second easiest fix in the whole RSPS world.

And if you want to do something nice, make a good server that isnt that
pi shit

Read full topic

@Premium-Elite wrote:

The Client Was saying error when loading… when trying to load so I fixed it so the new players could use… Try it go and download Erasedpkz and the client won’t work I’ve just fixed for new players and other users that’s all, Am not taking credit for making the hole client… just fixing the error for when it loads…
